ygData.subject: Re: IGL - Round Two
ygData.msgSnippet: Cliffjumper stepped out of the cell, for the first chance in a while to catch his bearings. He squinted, trying to look around, as his optics slowly came on

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Cliffjumper stepped out of the cell, for the first chance in a while to
catch his bearings. He squinted, trying to look around, as his optics
slowly came on line. "Whe...where in great cybertron am I?" asked the
small red autobot, as he wearily walked out of his cell. 

Then yellow arm grabbed him from behind, grabing onto his neck. "That's
a good question Autopunk." an obnoxious voice shouted, as the Stunticon
known as Drag Strip pulled Cliffjumper in, getting ready to smash him
with his other fist. Cliffjumper quickly went to his knees, then using
the larger robots own momentum, stood up quickly sending the Stunticon
into a wall with a large thud. Two other robots ran out of the cell,
Wildrider and Breakdown. 

"Why you little, no one does that to the Drag Strip, except Wildrider."
the crazed grey robot shouted as he ran towards Cliffjumper. Cliffjumper
was still trying to recover from the shock, as his instincts did the
work for him. He gracefully leapt backwards, onto Drag Strip, then used
the suicidal racer as a catapult to launch himself straight into
Wildrider, shoulder first, sending them both barreling into Breakdown,
as they fell in a crumbled mess against another wall. Cliffjumper pulled
himself up, trying to shake loose the screws in his head, when he his
suddenly jerked several feet into the air, being held by a powerful
large greay fist, almost totally encircling his head. Cliffjumper then
begins to flail his body in an attempt to escape. 

"Let me go Motormaster, you big freak, and i'll shove your cylinders
down your throat module." 

Motormast stood in the doorway with no emotion on his face at all,
simply holding Cliffjumper up easily with one hand. "Shut up Squirt."
Echoed Motormaster's hollow and gruff voice. He then began to slowly
increase pressure around Cliffjumper's head.
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Grimlock simply followed Sinew.
